mapper.select: SELECT tmp.TABLE_NAME HREF_NAME, IFNULL(tmp_size.ROW_SIZE, 0) ROW_SIZE, t.* FROM information_schema.TABLES t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'flex_anphu' ORDER BY TABLE_NAME ) tmp ON t.TABLE_NAME = CONCAT(tmp.TABLE_NAME, '_detail') OR tmp.TABLE_NAME = CONCAT(t.TABLE_NAME, '_detail') LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TABLE_NAME, SUM( CASE WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' THEN CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH * 1 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'char' THEN CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH * 1 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'tinytext' THEN 255 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'text' THEN 65535 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'mediumtext' THEN 16777215 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'longtext' THEN 4294967295 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'tinyint' THEN 1 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'smallint' THEN 2 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'mediumint' THEN 3 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'int' THEN 4 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'bigint' THEN 8 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'float' THEN 4 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'double' THEN 8 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'decimal' THEN (CASE WHEN NUMERIC_PRECISION IS NOT NULL THEN NUMERIC_PRECISION ELSE 10 END) + 1 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'date' THEN 3 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'datetime' THEN 8 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'timestamp' THEN 4 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'time' THEN 3 WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'year' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ROW_SIZE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'flex_anphu' GROUP BY TABLE_NAME ) tmp_size ON t.TABLE_NAME = tmp_size.TABLE_NAME WHERE t.TABLE_SCHEMA = 'flex_anphu' ORDER BY t.TABLE_NAME;
